menus.Basics: Basic Commands These are some of the basic commands, which should be known to most
menus.Save: Save Commands You can use these commands to save and retrieve various messages
menus.AntiSpam: Lock Commands Here you can lock media and other message types from being sent. You can also modify these in settings
menus.Group: Group Commands Use these commands specifically to moderate and modify your group
menus.Banhammer: Banhammer Commands BOOM! Wield Char's hammer with pride. Keep spammers out of your chat with these commands
menus.Mutehammer: Mute Commands Keep annoying chatmembers from talking, and stop OT with the mute commands
menus.Moderators: Moderator Commands Promote and demote moderators, along with restricting their functions (coming soon)

Basics.Add: add - Use this to add a supergroup to my database, and let me moderate it
Basics.Rm: rm - This will remove a supergroup from my database, and I'll no longer moderate it (although some commands will still be available)
Basics.Settings: settings - Modify the settings of a group
Basics.Time: time area - Get the time and date for any given area!
Basics.Weather: weather area - Get the weather, and temperature, for any given area!
Basics.Stats: stats [@username|ID|by reply] - Get their name, username, and bot-related information about them
Basics.ID: id [@username|ID|by reply] - Get a users ID from their username, or vice versa
Basics.Join: join [invite link] - Invite my partner to the group! Note: the link must be in the format [https://t.me/joinchat/...]

Save.Save: save name message - Save message under name to be retrieved later with #name
Save.SaveFrom: save from name - Save a message [by reply] under name to be retrieved later with #name
Save.SaveClear: save clear name - Clear the saved message under name
Save.Saved: saved - Get a list of saved messages!

AntiSpam.Lock: lock [lock type] - Lock certain messages, making the bot remove them when they're sent.
AntiSpam.Unlock: unlock [lock type] - Unlock certain messages, letting people send them as they please
AntiSpam.Setflood: setflood integer - Set the flood limit. When users cross that limit, if flood is locked, they're kicked.
AntiSpam.Del: del [by reply] - Delete a message by reply. del [@username|ID] - Delete the ENTIRE HISTORY of a user from a chat.
AntiSpam.Purge: purge [by reply] - Delete all messages after the message you replied to. (Exercise EXTREME caution! You don't wanna lose you're whole chat).

Group.Pin: pin [by reply] - Pin a message. pin silent - Silently pin a message. Shhhhh.
Group.Setabout: setabout "about" - Change the about section of the group description. You MUST provide "about" in double quotes.
Group.Rules: setrules rules - Set the rules for the group. setrules clear - Clear the rules for the group. rules - See the rules for the group.
Group.Invite: invite [@username|ID] - Invite a user to the group! Note: the user must have their privacy settings set to allow the bot to invite them, and the group must allow the bot to add users.
Group.Adminlist: adminlist - Get a list of administrators for the group. If you spam this command, you'll just make them mad, so don't use this over and over.

Banhammer.Kick: kick [@username|ID|by reply] - Kick someone from a group!
Banhammer.Ban: ban [@username|ID|by reply] - Ban someone from rejoining a group. They are blocked and added to my banlist, and cannot be added by anyone.
Banhammer.Unban: unban [@username|ID|by reply] - Unban someone from a group. They can rejoin or be added at any time.
Banhammer.Banlist: banlist - Get a list of all the banned users and ID's for that chat.
Banhammer.Gbanlist: gbanlist - Get a list of all the globally banned users and ID's!
Banhammer.Kickme: kickme - Ask the bot to kick you (unless your a mod/admin)

Mutehammer.Mute: mute [@username|ID|by reply] - Mute a user, so that the bot deletes all their messages as they're sent mute all - Mute everyone, minus admins and moderators
Mutehammer.Unmute: unmute @username/ID - Unmute a user, giving them the right of free speech once more unmute all - Unmute everyone, and bring back free speech
Mutehammer.Mutelist: mutelist - Get a list of the pests that have been silenced in the current chat.

Moderators.Promote: promote [@username|ID|by reply] - Promote someone to moderator status
Moderators.Demote: demote [@username|ID|by reply] - Demote someone back to user status
Moderators.Modlist: modlist - Get a list of moderators for the current chat.
